LanguageData.Option2_Desc: simulate animal's cycle. this option will apply after save loaded not recommended
LanguageData.Option3_Desc: set implantation chance of fertilized egg this value determines finalizing chacne of impregnation
LanguageData.Option4_Desc: set fertilize chance of 1mL of sperm on every hour this value determines beginning chance of impregnation
LanguageData.Option5_Desc: cum will decrease about this ratio this value affects on the fertility chacne indirectly
LanguageData.Option6_Label: cum fertility decay ratio per hour
LanguageData.Option6_Desc: cum will lose fertility about this ratio this value affects on the fertility chance indirectly estimated sperm lifespan: cum lose most of fertility at this time.
LanguageData.Option9_Desc: draw womb icon in status window
LanguageData.Option10_Desc: draw vagina, anus and breast icon in status window
LanguageData.Option11_Desc_2: Show all informations about fetus after noticed pregnancy
LanguageData.Option11_Desc_3: Do not show informations about fetus, but display image of fetus after noticed pregnancy
LanguageData.Option11_Desc_4: Do not show fetus image and informations
LanguageData.Option12_Desc: enable menopause effect that makes pawn infertile in time progress if you have problems with long life races, turn off this option. this option will apply after save loaded
LanguageData.Option13_Desc: use multiple pregnancy instead RJW's default pregnancy disable this option if you are in trouble with impregnation
LanguageData.Option14_Desc: enable multiple eggs can get pregnant
LanguageData.Option15_Desc: enable single egg to result multiple offsprings
LanguageData.Option18_Desc: enable egg overlay on womb icon
LanguageData.Option19_Desc: set bleeding amount actual bleeding amount can be different depending on vagina the generic bleeding amount of human female is about 20~80ml per month
LanguageData.Option21_Desc: the gizmo and button will appear for these pawns
LanguageData.Option22_Desc: overrides RJW and RaceSupport's hybrid definition Dominant hybrid extension determines whose definition used first. Not recommended to change this
LanguageData.Option24_Label: Transition variance of nipples after pregnancy
LanguageData.Option24_Desc: Set how much nipples/areolas be darker/wider on every pregnancy.
LanguageData.Option25_Desc: Set how much nipples/areolas be darker/wider permanently on every pregnancy.
LanguageData.Option26_Desc: Nipples/areolas won't be darker/wider than this value.
LanguageData.Option27_Desc: Set speed of transition of nipples/areolas. 1 = instant transition
LanguageData.Option28_Tooltip: Open custom hybrid editor. This will overrides hybrid definitions of XML files.
LanguageData.Option29_Desc: Let icon become smaller If needed.
LanguageData.CustomHybrid_Tooltip: When {0} breed with {1}, {2} will be born at {3} chance. If both races have hybrid definitions for each other, the father's definition will be used.
